HOW TO PLAY

So so easy to play. Tap your finger anywhere on the screen to shoot your sweetcorn gun or laser and blast the pigs. Don't let the pigs get past the bottom of the screen 3 times or it's game over.

The word is Chicks Revenge : Tiny Pig Killer is becoming one of the best games in the market and is getting more and more downloads each day. Chicks is out to get revenge on the big bad pigs. He's got his sweet corn gun, his rockets, his star sword, his superman suit, his ice freeze weapon, and he's ready to rock. With cute art, catchy music, great game play and game modes, Chicks Revenge : Tiny Pig Killer will keep you coming back for more and more. Tap the fruit for more score, and the faster you tap, the more you blast the pigs.

Download it for FREE and play our top game today!

85,000 is the worlds best record so far. If you beat this score, please send us a screenshot or video capture and we will post it here for the world to see.
